about.title: Welcome to the club!
about.description: Our club encourages adoption of best practice software development techniques for children and young adults. We want to help you get building things quickly whilst building good habits which will serve you well throughout your life.

syllabus.title: Workspace Setup - Getting Comfortable at your Desk
Operating Systems - What, When and Why?
Programming Languages - What, When and Why?
Head into the Cloud - How can we deploy our code
Other Cloud Services - Using 3rd party APIs
Authentication and Access Control - Let the goodies in!
Automated Security Auditing - Keep the baddies out!
Kubernetes and Computing Clusters - A Basic Introduction

howTo.title: Browse examples on our Github (TODO: switch to GitLab)
Setup AWS to deploy examples on your very own server
